answers.author: Tracey Shiflett
answers.text:
Just off the top of my head, I would want to know how he/she handles PR issues, use of force, regional policing/mutual aid, 911 dispatch savvy, overtime management, whether they have dealt with USERRA/deployment of personnel issues, and of course budget management and grant writing experience.
